Name: One Night On The Road
About the game: One Night On the Road is a quest in which You have to play as a character who has run out of fuel in the car. And now you have to find fuel in a small town. During the search, you can learn about the mysterious history of a resident of the city. Explore the world to uncover a mysterious story Find items that will help you understand the story. Play on 1 computer together Via Steam RemotePlay or with a keyboard and joystick.
